targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  channel_id,
  session_id,
  connection_id,
  client_id,
  role,
  version,
  label,
  node_name,
  multistream,
  simulcast,
  spotlight,
  created_at
FROM sora_connection
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  channel_id = '$sora_channel_id' AND
  label = '$sora_label' AND
  node_name = '$sora_node_name' AND
  version = '$sora_version'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  stats_id,
  mime_type,
  clock_rate,
  payload_type,
  channels
FROM rtc_codec_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  packets_sent,
  packets_received,
  bytes_sent,
  bytes_received,
  local_certificate_id,
  tls_version,
  dtls_cipher,
  srtp_cipher,
  selected_candidate_pair_changes
FROM rtc_transport_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  bytes_received - lag(bytes_received) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_received",
  bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_sent"
FROM rtc_transport_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  bytes_received - lag(bytes_received) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_received",
  bytes_received AS "bytes_received (total)",
  bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_sent",
  bytes_sent AS "bytes_sent (total)"
FROM rtc_transport_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  packets_received - lag(packets_received) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_received",
  packets_sent - lag(packets_sent) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_sent"
FROM rtc_transport_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  packets_received - lag(packets_received) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_received",
  packets_received AS "packets_received (total)",
  packets_sent - lag(packets_sent) OVER (ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_sent",
  packets_sent AS "packets_sent (total)"
FROM rtc_transport_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id,
  ssrc,
  kind,
  codec_id,
  packets_received,
  packets_lost,
  jitter,
  packets_discarded,
  packets_repaired,
  burst_packets_lost,
  burst_packets_discarded,
  burst_loss_count,
  burst_discard_count,
  burst_loss_rate,
  burst_discard_rate,
  gap_loss_rate,
  gap_discard_rate,
  frames_dropped,
  partial_frames_lost,
  full_frames_lost,
  remote_id,
  frames_decoded,
  key_frames_decoded,
  frame_width,
  frame_height,
  frame_bit_depth,
  frames_per_second,
  qp_sum,
  total_decode_time,
  total_inter_frame_delay,
  total_squared_inter_frame_delay,
  voice_activity_flag,
  last_packet_received_timestamp,
  average_rtcp_interval,
  header_bytes_received,
  fec_packets_received,
  fec_packets_discarded,
  bytes_received,
  packets_failed_decryption,
  packets_duplicated,
  nack_count,
  fir_count,
  pli_count,
  sli_count,
  total_processing_delay,
  estimated_playout_timestamp,
  jitter_buffer_delay,
  jitter_buffer_emitted_count,
  total_samples_received,
  total_samples_decoded,
  samples_decoded_with_silk,
  samples_decoded_with_celt,
  concealed_samples,
  silent_concealed_samples,
  concealment_events,
  inserted_samples_for_deceleration,
  removed_samples_for_acceleration,
  audio_level,
  total_audio_energy,
  total_samples_duration,
  frames_received,
  decoder_implementation
FROM rtc_inbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  bytes_received - lag(bytes_received) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_received"
FROM rtc_inbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  bytes_received - lag(bytes_received) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_received",
  bytes_received AS "bytes_received (total)"
FROM rtc_inbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  packets_received - lag(packets_received) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_received"
FROM rtc_inbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  packets_received - lag(packets_received) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_received",
  packets_received AS "packets_received (total)"
FROM rtc_inbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id,
  ssrc,
  kind,
  codec_id,
  packets_sent,
  bytes_sent,
  rtx_ssrc,
  media_source_id,
  remote_id,
  last_packet_sent_timestamp,
  header_bytes_sent,
  packets_discarded_on_send,
  bytes_discarded_on_send,
  fec_packets_sent,
  retransmitted_packets_sent,
  retransmitted_bytes_sent,
  target_bitrate,
  total_encoded_bytes_target,
  frame_width,
  frame_height,
  frame_bit_depth,
  frames_per_second,
  frames_sent,
  huge_frames_sent,
  frames_encoded,
  key_frames_encoded,
  frames_discarded_on_send,
  qp_sum,
  total_samples_sent,
  samples_encoded_with_silk,
  samples_encoded_with_celt,
  voice_activity_flag,
  total_encode_time,
  total_packet_send_delay,
  average_rtcp_interval,
  quality_limitation_resolution_changes,
  nack_count,
  fir_count,
  pli_count,
  sli_count,
  encoder_implementation
FROM rtc_outbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_sent"
FROM rtc_outbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_sent ",
  bytes_sent AS "bytes_sent (total)"
FROM rtc_outbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  packets_sent - lag(packets_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_sent"
FROM rtc_outbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  packets_sent - lag(packets_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY stats_id ORDER BY "time") AS "packets_sent",
  packets_sent AS "packets_sent (total)"
FROM rtc_outbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  width,
  height,
  bit_depth,
  frames,
  frames_per_second
FROM rtc_video_source_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  width,
  height
FROM rtc_video_source_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  width,
  height
FROM rtc_video_source_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  frames_per_second
FROM rtc_video_source_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  frames_per_second,
  frames
FROM rtc_video_source_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  audio_level,
  total_audio_energy,
  total_samples_duration,
  echo_return_loss,
  echo_return_loss_enhancement
FROM rtc_audio_source_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label,
  data_channel_identifier,
  messages_sent,
  messages_received,
  bytes_sent,
  bytes_received,
  state
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  messages_received - lag(messages_received) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "messages_received"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  messages_received - lag(messages_received) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "messages_received",
  messages_received AS "messages_received (total)"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  messages_sent - lag(messages_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "messages_sent"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  messages_sent - lag(messages_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "messages_sent",
  messages_sent AS "messages_sent (total)"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  bytes_received - lag(bytes_received) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_received"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  bytes_received - lag(bytes_received) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_received",
  bytes_received AS "bytes_received (total)"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_sent"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  label AS metric,
  bytes_sent - lag(bytes_sent) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY "time") AS "bytes_sent",
  bytes_sent AS "bytes_sent (total)"
FROM rtc_data_channel_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_type,
  stats_id,
  address,
  port,
  protocol,
  candidate_type,
  priority,
  url,
  relay_protocol
FROM rtc_ice_candidate_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  packets_sent,
  packets_received,
  bytes_sent,
  bytes_received,
  last_packet_sent_timestamp,
  last_packet_received_timestamp,
  first_request_timestamp,
  last_request_timestamp,
  last_response_timestamp,
  total_round_trip_time,
  current_round_trip_time,
  available_outgoing_bitrate,
  available_incoming_bitrate,
  circuit_breaker_trigger_count,
  requests_received,
  requests_sent,
  responses_received,
  responses_sent,
  retransmissions_received,
  retransmissions_sent,
  consent_requests_sent,
  consent_expired_timestamp,
  packets_discarded_on_send,
  bytes_discarded_on_send,
  request_bytes_sent,
  consent_request_bytes_sent,
  response_bytes_sent
FROM rtc_ice_candidate_pair_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  packets_received,
  packets_lost,
  jitter,
  packets_discarded,
  packets_repaired,
  burst_packets_lost,
  burst_packets_discarded,
  burst_loss_count,
  burst_discard_count,
  burst_loss_rate,
  burst_discard_rate,
  gap_loss_rate,
  gap_discard_rate,
  frames_dropped,
  partial_frames_lost,
  full_frames_lost,
  round_trip_time,
  total_round_trip_time,
  fraction_lost,
  reports_received,
  round_trip_time_measurements
FROM rtc_remote_inbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  stats_id AS metric,
  packets_sent,
  bytes_sent,
  reports_sent,
  round_trip_time,
  total_round_trip_time,
  round_trip_time_measurements
FROM rtc_remote_outbound_rtp_stream_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  sora_connection_id = '$sora_connection_id'
ORDER BY 1,2

list.definition: SELECT channel_id FROM sora_connection  ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
list.name: sora_channel_id
list.query: SELECT channel_id FROM sora_connection  ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT connection_id FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
list.name: sora_connection_id
list.query: SELECT connection_id FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT label FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' AND connection_id='$sora_connection_id' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
list.name: sora_label
list.query: SELECT label FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' AND connection_id='$sora_connection_id' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT node_name FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' AND connection_id='$sora_connection_id' AND label='$sora_label' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
list.name: sora_node_name
list.query: SELECT node_name FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' AND connection_id='$sora_connection_id' AND label='$sora_label' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT version FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' AND connection_id='$sora_connection_id' AND label='$sora_label' AND node_name='$sora_node_name' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
list.name: sora_version
list.query: SELECT version FROM sora_connection WHERE  channel_id='$sora_channel_id' AND connection_id='$sora_connection_id' AND label='$sora_label' AND node_name='$sora_node_name' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 50
